CREATE_VPG_REPLICATION.REPLICATION_INFO: Specify the recovery site and default values to use for replication to this site.
CREATE_VPG_REPLICATION.CHANGING_DEFAULT_VALUES: Changing the default value only affects New VMs in the VPG and not existing VMs in the VPG. To update existing VMs, edit them in 'VM Settings'
CREATE_VPG_REPLICATION.VM_SETTINGS_ERROR: Some VMs have no recovery host or datastore and there is no default selected
CREATE_VPG_REPLICATION.JOURNAL_SIZE_WARNING: The selected service profile has a smaller VM journal size hard limit than defined for the VPG. The current journal size for the VPG is not changed. All other values affected by the selected service profile are implemented for the VPG.
CREATE_VPG_REPLICATION.CUSTOM_SERVICE_PROFILE_WARNING: The ZORG "{{value}}" cannot use a custom service profile. If you continue, the custom service profile will be replaced with the default system service profile.
